_header: Saint Cuthbert life who list to lere
Subjects: Cuthbert, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Cuthbert — 8362 short lines in couplets

BLEge3309.First Lines:
Saynt cuthbert lyfe who lyste to lereAnd forto knawe þat
                    coresaynte clere…
BLEge3309.Last Lines:
…All þat helps saint cuthbert thingTo heuens blis oure
                    god þaim bring
BLEge3309.Editions:
Fowler,  Joseph Thomas,
                        ed.  
             The Life of St Cuthbert in English Verse, c. A.D 1450 from the original
                MS. in the Library at Castle Howard.
Surtees Society
         87 (1891): 1-245.
